docs.text: Service/Subsystem: Owner: Env(s): dev/stg/prod Date:

docs.title: DoD
docs.text:
• Containerized with health check and limits
  • Logs → Loki, metrics → Prometheus, alerts defined
  • Config & secrets externalized (Vault/Vaultwarden)
  • GitOps pipeline (+ staging + canary + rollback)
  • Runbook updated in MkDocs
  • Ops Journal entry added

docs.title: Risks & Mitigation
docs.text:
• Rollback plan
  • Backup verified before change
  • Approvals for irreversible actions

docs.title: Refactor Milestones
docs.text:
• M1 — Foundations: Guardrails, gates, monitoring
  • M2 — Deployment Hygiene: GitOps pipelines live
  • M3 — Observability Upgrade: Dashboards + auto-remediation
  • M4 — Agent Consistency: Agent specs + SLOs
  • M5 — Media Stability: Seedbox gates + integrity
  • M6 — Lean Realm: Decommission legacy; Mac mini integrated

docs.title: Refactor Program Overview
docs.text:
A pragmatic, low-risk plan to migrate the realm to modular, self-healing, well-documented systems.

Updated: 2025-09-22

docs.title: Objectives
docs.text:
• Reduce tech debt and snowflake configs
  • Standardize GitOps deployment
  • Strengthen observability and automated remediation
  • Align agents (Claude/CodeX/Gemini/local) to a common spec
  • Keep the realm operational with gates and canaries

See: docs/refactor/phases.md, docs/refactor/checklist-template.md, docs/refactor/milestones.md.

docs.title: Phase 0 — Inventory & Baselines
docs.text: • Asset map, dependencies, SLO baselines, backup restore test

docs.title: Phase 1 — Guardrails First
docs.text: • Health checks, alerts, YAML gates, chat approvals

docs.title: Phase 2 — GitOps & Config Hygiene
docs.text: • Containerize services, Vault/Vaultwarden for secrets, pull-based deploys

docs.title: Phase 3 — Observability & Self-Healing
docs.text: • Metrics/logs/dashboards, remediation scripts, anomaly gates

docs.title: Phase 4 — AI Agents Standardization
docs.text: • Agent specs, attribution logs, canary + SLO alarms

docs.title: Phase 5 — Media & Seedbox Hardening
docs.text: • rclone with checksums, quotas and pruning gates, provenance scans

docs.title: Phase 6 — De-risk & Decommission
docs.text: • Retire dead cron/scripts, onboard Mac mini worker, reduce surface area
